amendment.description: To reauthorize the Maritime Administration, and for other purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1797 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1797 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Lautenberg. (consideration: CR S8025-8029) To reauthorize the Maritime Administration, and for other purposes.
